name: stencil-cursor-context
description: Version-controlled AI context and memory management for Stencil.js core project

scripts.help: echo 'Available commands:' && echo '  npm run memory-sync       - Sync memories with IDE' && echo '  npm run memory-sync:dry-run - Preview sync changes' && echo '  npm run validate         - Check .cursor structure'
